sentences.en: "Well," she said a little uneasily, "what is it?"
sentences.cn: “噢，”她有些不自在地说道，“是什么？”

sentences.en: a cake decorated with little flowers
sentences.cn: 点缀着小花的蛋糕

sentences.en: a factor of no little importance.
sentences.cn: 很重要的因素。

sentences.en: a little house
sentences.cn: 小屋

sentences.en: At their approach the little boy scurried away and hid.
sentences.cn: 他们走近时，小男孩急忙跑开藏了起来。

sentences.en: felt a little better.
sentences.cn: 感觉好了一点

sentences.en: He complained a little of a nagging pain between his shoulder blades.
sentences.cn: 他有几句提到说肩胛骨之间一直在疼。

sentences.en: He could just about see the little man behind the counter.
sentences.cn: 他勉强能看到柜台后面的小个子男人。

sentences.en: I saw through your little ruse from the start.
sentences.cn: 从一开始我就看穿了你的小计谋。

sentences.en: Let me tell you a little bit about myself.
sentences.cn: 我来给你稍微讲讲我自己吧。

sentences.en: Maria was talking baby talk to the little one.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚正用儿语和小家伙说话。

sentences.en: not a little consternation was caused.
sentences.cn: 造成了不小的恐慌。

sentences.en: On their way back to Marseille they spoke very little.
sentences.cn: 在他们回马赛的路上，他们说话不多。

sentences.en: Our tour prices bore little resemblance to those in the holiday brochures.
sentences.cn: 我们的旅游报价和那些度假手册里的价格相去甚远。

sentences.en: She was cutting the meat up into little bits.
sentences.cn: 她把肉切成小丁。

sentences.en: Sightseers may be a little overwhelmed by the crowds and noise.
sentences.cn: 拥挤的人群和喧闹的噪音可能会让游客有些茫然不知所措。

sentences.en: some spoke quite a little English.
sentences.cn: 有些人大讲英语。

sentences.en: T-shirts are a nice little earner and it's better than the dole.
sentences.cn: 卖T恤衫来钱容易，比领救济金好。

sentences.en: There can be little doubt that he will offend again.
sentences.cn: 毋庸置疑他还会再犯的。

sentences.en: There was very little snobbery or class-consciousness in the wartime navy.
sentences.cn: 战时的海军中很少有势利眼，阶级意识也不强。

sentences.en: they made little of their royal connection.
sentences.cn: 他们没把与王室的关系当回事儿。

sentences.en: They stopped at a little cafe and had a fondue.
sentences.cn: 他们在一家小餐馆歇脚，吃了顿干酪火锅。

sentences.en: They were going to sail around the little island, against the tide.
sentences.cn: 他们打算绕着小岛逆潮航行。

sentences.en: This little ball of gold weighs a quarter of an ounce.
sentences.cn: 这个小金球重0.25盎司。

sentences.en: We didn’t have toys like this when I was little.
sentences.cn: 在我小时候，我们没有这样的玩具。

sentences.en: Will you lend me your jacket for a little while?
sentences.cn: 你能把上衣借给我穿一会儿吗？

sentences.en: you've become quite the little horsewoman.
sentences.cn: 你现在确实已成为女骑师了。

words.tran_cn: 小的;可爱的;少的;不多的

phrases.tran_cn: 并不比…好；简直和…一样(坏)；简直就是
逐渐地：慢慢地或逐渐增长地；渐渐地
与…不相上于；与…几乎相同
［用以表示不情愿地或讽刺地承认某人具备能力或取得了成就］的确，真正

trans.tran_cn: 小的，可爱的，年幼的，短的，不严重的

trans.tran_en: Little means not very often or to only a small extent
